name: The Blackstone Liturgy
description: This scuffed and damaged tome is written in blood on ink-stained pages. It purports to be autobiographical in nature.

name: The Book of Defense: Fortitude
description: This is part of a set of three volumes, each focusing on a different area of defensive abilities. This particular volume focuses on physical fortitude, allowing you to defend yourself by powering through dangerous attacks.

name: The Book of Defense: Reflexes
description: This is part of a set of three volumes, each focusing on a different area of defensive abilities. This particular volume focuses on staying nimble to avoid damage, allowing you to defend yourself with superior reaction speed.

name: The Book of Defense: Willpower
description: This is part of a set of three volumes, each focusing on a different area of defensive abilities. This particular volume focuses on mental fortitude, allowing you to stay focused in times of great danger.

name: The Eye of Daanvi
description: Slotted Effect: This weapon becomes Lawfully aligned, and on each hit, deals 10d6 extra Law damage to all non-Lawful enemies.

description: Slotted Effect: This weapon becomes an Implement. +146 Equipment bonus to Positive and Force Spell Power.

name: The Eye of Mabar
description: Slotted Effect: This weapon becomes an Evil aligned. You heal 5d2 damage per strike, and when you slay an enemy, you 15 Temporary HP. If you are Undead, the healing becomes Negative.

name: The Eye of Shavarath
description: Slotted Effect: You are immune to Fear. On a Critical Hit, this weapon applies the Shaken debuff.
